author: Kamal Ali and Michael J. Pazzani
title: Error Reduction through Learning Multiple Descriptions
window: uniformly weighted voting between eleven, stochastically-generated descriptions is only one seventh that of the error obtained by using a single description. On the other hand, on the primary tumor data set, the error obtained by the identical multiple models procedure is the same as that obtained by using a single description.
